QuestData.Title: The Wrath of Shek'zeer
QuestData.Description: The rest of the freed paragons are scattered around the Heart of Fear, fighting off the mantid swarm. They may need your help!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rout the Mantid Swarm by slaying Akkolon, Shox'tik, the Manifestation of Terror, and 25 mantid subjugates.
